member.synopsis:
I am very interested in a Electrical role. I have been seeking an opportunity like this, and I believe my background and position profile are an excellent match. As you will see in my CV, I have: EAL Diploma Electro-technical Services - Level 3 from South Thames College and extensive customer service experience from working for organisations that demand customer satisfaction and a high standard of service.
I realise that in todayâ€™s rapidly changing economy, it is vital that we play a more active role in managing our career. Finding the right career path is akin to looking for a life time commitment, since one spends as much time, if not more, at the workplace.
In addition to my experience and training, I am bilingual (speaking Gujarati and English). I am passionate about a career within the Construction Industry for several reasons. Firstly it taps into my creative side and utilizes my ability to organise well. I am certain that this role will be the start of applying these skills I already have and learn some more. I believe I have the skill set required for this role, excellent communication skills, and great attention to detail, time management and work effectively in a team as well as on my own initiative.
I believe the reasons that will motivate me to excel are a firm faith in the profession that I choose, a focussed effort to align my strengths to do what I do best and achieve the rightfully deserved results. Thus, at this stage of my career, I look forward to finding a job position such as this, as it will guide me towards aligning my strengths with the job function.
